short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickScraper API handles proxies, browsers, and CAPTCHAs, You can get the HTML, CSV, Excel, JSON with a simple API call!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickScraper’s API lets you rotate your IP address with each request from a pool of millions of proxies and over a dozen ISPs. That means you can get past annoying blocks in record time!

Automatically retry failed requests so that you can get the data you need without getting blocked.

And because QuickScraper provides more than 10 geolocations, you’ll be able to extract data from different countries.

With QuickScraper, you can fully customize request headers, request type, and IP geolocation to tailor the API to your needs

Use a headless browser for easy rendering of Javascript and create sessions to reuse IP addresses multiple times.

This tool also regularly removes slow proxies from the pool, so you’ll get unlimited bandwidth up to 100 Mbps.

QuickScraper also lets you invite team members to work on multiple tasks simultaneously from the same account.

That means you’ll be able to split your workload without worrying about splitting your resources!

Plus, you can rest easy knowing that QuickScraper offers unmatched speed and reliability, so you can easily create scalable web scrapers.

Best of all, you can integrate QuickScraper with Zapier to automate tasks in just a few simple steps.

You’ll be able to connect to a ton of applications that streamline your workflow, like Gmail, Slack, and Google Drive.

And because QuickScraper helps you automate repetitive tasks, your business can tackle real-world challenges and meet changing market demands stress-free.
